name: alp-browser
description: framework for browser based on ibex
author: Christophe Hurpeau <christophe@hurpeau.com> (http://christophe.hurpeau.com/)

scripts.build: rm -Rf dist && BABEL_ENV=es5 babel -s --out-dir dist/es5 src && BABEL_ENV=es5-dev babel -s --out-dir dist/es5-dev src && BABEL_ENV=modern-browsers babel -s --out-dir dist/modern-browsers src && BABEL_ENV=modern-browsers-dev babel -s --out-dir dist/modern-browsers-dev src
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run build && pob-repository-check-clean
scripts.build:dev: rm -Rf dist/*-dev/ && BABEL_ENV=es5-dev babel -s --out-dir dist/es5-dev src && BABEL_ENV=modern-browsers-dev babel -s --out-dir dist/modern-browsers-dev src
scripts.watch:dev: rm -Rf dist test/node6 && echo "BABEL_ENV=es5-dev babel -sw --out-dir dist/es5-dev src\nBABEL_ENV=modern-browsers-dev babel -sw --out-dir dist/modern-browsers-dev src" | while read i; do printf "%q\n" "$i"; done | xargs -n1 -P 2 -I cmd bash -c "cmd"
